products.title: Eco Friendly Fr Cream Panel Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled panel blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new cream roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Luna Blackout Bone Cream Perfect Fit
products.description: Luna blackoutbonecream perfect fit pleated blind. Part of ourluna blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "luna blackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Luxa, Cream - Vista Blind
products.description: Natura cream breathes life into any modern decorated home by celebrating the interplay between fabric and light. A finely crafted voile is applied with care to a gently shaded cream fabric which is soft to the touch. With different shades flowing effortlessly into one another cream allows you to see something different every time you look at it. Give your living room a modern take on the country style of decor by pairing natura cream with stone grey items such as a rug in front of the fire or a selection of scatter cushions on the sofa.

products.title: Lexington Dove Grey Thermal Pleated Free-hanging Blind
products.description: Their lexington collection of thermal perfect fit pleated blinds is both luxurious and practical. Featuring their thermal fabric technology - these blinds keep your home warm in the winter whilst still maintaining the sophisticated look of pleated blinds. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds their lexington collection is ideal because of the celluar technology - honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit the heat transfer from your windows.

products.title: Lexington Cream Thermal Pleated Free-hanging Blind
products.description: Their lexington collection of thermal perfect fit pleated blinds is both luxurious and practical. products.title: Hampton Dove Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Grey is the new white in the world of interiors, and this hampton dove is a particularly on-trend shade. Instead of a block colour, the polyester blind is made up of short strokes of lighter and darker greys, for a lively and organic effect. These horizontal strokes marry well with the pleated ripples that run throughout the fabric, the concertina effect creating its own natural highlights and pooling shadows.

products.title: Kingston Cream Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Create elegant shading in your window with the kingston cream pleated perfect fit. The game-changing blind style fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall above, for a simple tools-free installation system. Colour match your perfect fit frame to your upvc window for an integrated, cohesive look. The cream hue has a classic elegance that's well suited to traditional interiors.

products.title: Daytona, Linen - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The pretty cream tone of the daytona in linen is soft and cosy, and covers the shutters flawlessly. Durable, water-resistant faux wood means no cracking and no warping, making them perfect for any room in the home, even bathrooms and kitchens. Settle the linen amidst warm chocolate browns and subtle lattes for a relaxing and luxurious look in the master bedroom or living room. Keep the room feeling light and airy with plenty of matching creams and lots of light.

products.title: Bayham, Butter - Vista Blind
products.description: Bayham butter brings a warm and inviting presence to your home by combining the rich colour of butter with the finely woven fabric of the voile panels that hold it in place. Elegantly suspended and lightweight so it moves with grace when you adjust the light to suit your mood, you'll never think the same way about how light interacts with your decor again. Butter looks amazing when you put it in touch with a range of warm yet slightly washed out colours so that you can add energy and warmth to your room without overpowering your senses.

products.title: Natura, Cream - Vista Blind
products.description: Natura cream breathes life into any modern decorated home by celebrating the interplay between fabric and light. A finely crafted voile is applied with care to a gently shaded cream fabric which is soft to the touch. With different shades flowing effortlessly into one another cream allows you to see something different every time you look at it. Give your living room a modern take on the country style of decor by pairing natura cream with stone grey items such as a rug in front of the fire or a selection of scatter cushions on the sofa.

products.title: Daytona, Boutique Cream - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The daytona in boutique cream offers a classic cream shade on a durable faux wood that you'd be hard-pressed to tell apart from the real thing. Choose from the traditional full height style, the unique caf style, and the versatile tier on tier style. Surround the boutique cream with soft mauves and lavenders for a relaxing and serene ambience in your master bedroom or even living room. Or, opt for a pretty pastel pink bathroom look, adding rose pinks to the lovely cream of the shutter.

products.title: Splash Oyster Electric Roller Blind
products.description: The splash oyster electric roller blind is a very light, natural cream colour. This neutral tone will work well in most spaces and look beautiful when matched with woods throughout the home. Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe. This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with their smart hub (sold seperately).

products.description: Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties. This splash dove grey electric roller blind will update and brighten any interior.
